statements: SELECT * FROM PolicyStorage LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, policy_definition FROM PolicyStorage WHERE agent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT agent_id, action_selection_strategy FROM PolicyStorage ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyStorage WHERE action_selection_strategy = 'priority' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, agent_id, created_at FROM PolicyStorage ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM PolicyStorage WHERE policy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policy_definition, action_selection_strategy FROM PolicyStorage WHERE agent_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT policy_id, action_selection_strategy, created_at FROM PolicyStorage WHERE agent_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT policy_id, policy_definition FROM PolicyStorage WHERE agent_id = '423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND action_selection_strategy = 'random' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM PolicyStorage GROUP BY agent_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_policies DESC;
SELECT * FROM learned_policies;
SELECT agent_name, policy_description FROM learned_policies;
SELECT policy_id, agent_name, policy_description FROM learned_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM action_strategies;
SELECT agent_name, strategy_description FROM action_strategies;
SELECT * FROM learned_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, policy_description FROM learned_policies WHERE agent_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM action_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, strategy_description FROM action_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT agent_name, policy_description FROM learned_policies WHERE policy_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT action_name, action_value FROM actions WHERE action_value > 100 ORDER BY action_id ASC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT agent_id, strategy_name FROM agent_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%coverage%' AND policy_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM policies p JOIN actions a ON p.policy_id = a.action_id GROUP BY policy_name HAVING total_actions > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT agent_id, SUM(action_value) AS total_value FROM agent_strategies GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT p.policy_name, a.action_name, as.strategy_name FROM policies p JOIN actions a ON p.policy_id = a.action_id JOIN agent_strategies as ON p.policy_id = as.strategy_id WHERE p.policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PolicyStorage;
SELECT policy_name, action_selection_strategy FROM PolicyStorage ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, reward_function FROM PolicyStorage WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT agent_id, episode, steps FROM AgentHistory WHERE agent_id = 10 ORDER BY episode ASC;
SELECT agent_id, episode, reward_received FROM AgentLogs WHERE episode < 100 AND reward_received > 0 ORDER BY reward_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyStorage ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, action_selection_strategy FROM PolicyStorage WHERE reward_function = 'High Reward';
SELECT agent_id, MAX(episode) AS max_episode FROM AgentHistory GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT * FROM AgentHistory WHERE steps > 1000 ORDER BY steps ASC, episode DESC;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(reward_received) AS avg_reward FROM AgentLogs GROUP BY agent_id HAVING avg_reward > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM learned_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM learned_policies WHERE policy_id = '4384e364-9824-4c1e-a93c-6ace1480978e';
SELECT state_description, state_actions FROM environment_states ORDER BY state_description DESC;
SELECT agent_id, episode_id, state_history, action_history, reward_history FROM agent_history WHERE agent_id = 'd6f248b3-4d06-4952-bf7b-ebcc10501145';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, strategy_parameters FROM action_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%random%';
SELECT * FROM learned_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, state_space FROM learned_policies WHERE policy_id = '1234';
SELECT agent_id, MAX(total_rewards) AS max_rewards FROM agent_rewards GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY max_rewards DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, strategy_parameters FROM action_strategies WHERE strategy_parameters->>'type' = 'random';
SELECT state_id, state_description, state_actions FROM environment_states ORDER BY state_description DESC;
